hero.title: Beautiful Escape
hero.description:
One of the greatest things about the sport of surfing
is that you need only three things: your body,
a surfboard, and a wave.

qoute.description:
Surfing is the most blissful experience you can have
on this planet, a taste of heaven.
qoute.author: John McCarthy

media.description:
By better understanding the various aspects of
surfing, you will improve faster and have more
fun in the water.
